item.title: 就业激增重燃美联储关于利率限制程度的争论
item.description: 周五令人瞠目的就业数据很可能会激起一场已经在美联储官员中产生分歧的争论，争论的焦点是美联储的政策制定是否像他们预测的那样使经济放缓。【原文：Friday’s eye-popping jobs number is likely to energize a debate already dividing Federal Reserve officials over whether their policy setting is slowing the economy as much as they had predicted.】

item.title: 奇货通讯：人们痛恨通货膨胀的简单原因？
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 美联储降息押注受阻，美元升至一个月来最高点
item.description: 彭博社的一项美元强弱指数有望创下 2 月份以来最长的周连胜纪录，因为美国经济的强劲势头粉碎了人们对美联储近期政策中枢的残存希望。【原文：A Bloomberg gauge of dollar strength is on track for its longest weekly winning streak since February as the strength of the US economy crushed any remaining hopes of near-term Federal Reserve policy pivot.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉投票前通胀率降至 59% 的 10 年最低点
item.description: 由于中央银行采取干预措施吸收过剩的流动性，委内瑞拉的通货膨胀率降至 10 年来的最低点。【原文：Venezuelan inflation slowed to a 10-year low as the central bank intervenes to absorb excess liquidity.】

item.title: BCI 称私人信贷违约将清除 "游客投资者
item.description: 不列颠哥伦比亚投资管理公司（British Columbia Investment Management Corp.）预计，未来几个月违约率上升将把 "游客投资者 "赶出 1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷市场。【原文：British Columbia Investment Management Corp. expects rising defaults in coming months that will flush out “tourist investors” from the $1.7 trillion private credit market.】

item.title: 象牙海岸禁止部分可可销售，市场再遭威胁
item.description: 头号可可生产国象牙海岸（Ivory Coast）已采取措施，为当地加工商增加紧缺的供应，威胁限制可可豆出口，进一步收紧全球市场。【原文：Top cocoa producer Ivory Coast has taken steps to shore up scarce supplies for local processors, threatening to restrict bean exports and further tighten the global market.】

item.title: 前达能高管接任路威酩轩首席财务官
item.description: 伯纳德-阿诺特（Bernard Arnault）控制的奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）任命了其长期首席财务官的副手，为接替这一重要管理职位做准备。【原文：LVMH named a deputy to its long-time chief financial officer as the luxury group controlled by Bernard Arnault prepares for succession in the key executive role.】

item.title: 意大利开放光纤公司将获得 20 亿欧元的新债务和股权
item.description: 意大利 Open Fiber SpA 公司将获得约 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元）的新资金，以帮助其缓解财务压力。【原文：Italy’s Open Fiber SpA is set to secure about €2 billion ($2.2 billion) of fresh funds to help relieve its financial strains.】

item.title: 巴西肉类大亨通过玻利维亚交易拓展石油和天然气业务
item.description: 巴西巴蒂斯塔兄弟通过收购一家在玻利维亚塔里哈-查科盆地拥有三个天然气田的公司，扩大了家族在石油和天然气领域的能源版图。【原文：Brazil’s Batista brothers are expanding the family energy footprint in oil and gas with the acquisition of a company that has three natural-gas fields in the Tarija-Chaco basin in Bolivia.】

item.title: 乌克兰与债券持有人就 200 亿美元重组进行有限制的谈判
item.description: 一群国际债权人本周开始与乌克兰进行闭门会谈，双方努力防止乌克兰拖欠 200 亿美元的国际债务，同时抵御俄罗斯的入侵。【原文：A group of international creditors began closed talks with Ukraine this week, as the two sides work to prevent the country from defaulting on its $20 billion in international debt while it fends off an invasion by Russia.】

item.title: 西班牙储蓄银行监管法案估计为 180 亿欧元
item.description: 西班牙储蓄银行（包括 CaixaBank SA 和 Unicaja Banco SA）的一个游说团体称，在过去五年中，为遵守监管规定，这些银行已花费约 180 亿欧元（195 亿美元）。【原文：Spain’s savings banks including CaixaBank SA and Unicaja Banco SA have spent about €18 billion ($19.5 billion) to comply with regulation over the past five years, according to a lobby group that’s advocating for a reduction.】

item.title: Planet Fitness 出售 8 亿美元健身房特许经营支持债券
item.description: 连锁健身房 Planet Fitness 周四出售了 8 亿美元的债券，这些债券由特许经营协议、知识产权和设备销售支持，用于为部分债务再融资。【原文：Gym chain Planet Fitness on Thursday sold $800 million in bonds backed by franchise agreements, intellectual property and equipment sales to refinance some of its debt.】

item.title: 四年来最差一周使超级比索成为全球落后者
item.description: 墨西哥比索结束了近四年来最糟糕的一周，因为出人意料的选举结果让交易员们急于平仓全球货币市场上最拥挤的头寸之一。【原文：The Mexican peso is wrapping up the worst week in almost four years as a surprise election outcome sent traders rushing to unwind one of the most crowded positions in global currency markets.】

item.title: 债券岌岌可危，水泥生产商为达成 CSN 协议而努力
item.description: InterCement Participacoes SA 的债券在短短六周内违约的可能性约为五分之一，因为这家资金短缺的巴西公司正在争分夺秒地达成收购协议。【原文：Bonds in InterCement Participacoes SA are implying a roughly one-in-five chance of default in just six weeks time as the cash-strapped Brazilian company races against the clock to reach a takeover deal.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克及其公司面临的所有重大法律诉讼
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）及其公司卷入了数十起诉讼，从归咎于特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Elon Musk and his companies are embroiled in dozens of lawsuits, ranging from fatal crashes blamed on Tesla Inc.’s Autopilot system to civil rights complaints over the treatment of employees.】

item.title: 赞比亚 KoBold 公司斥资 23 亿美元建造巨型铜矿
item.description: 哈坎德-希奇莱马（Hakainde Hichilema）总统援引比尔-盖茨（Bill Gates）支持的矿业勘探公司 KoBold Metals 的数据称，该公司可能斥资 23 亿美元在赞比亚新建一座大型铜矿。【原文：KoBold Metals, the Bill Gates-backed mining exploration company, could spend $2.3 billion to build a major new copper mine in Zambia, President Hakainde Hichilema said, citing figures from the company.】

item.title: 欧洲准备对大量中国廉价电动汽车征收关税
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商正在努力应对大量涌入的廉价中国电动汽车。欧盟委员会在对中国政府向其汽车产业发放补贴的情况进行调查后，准备对从中国进口的电动汽车征收关税。这些关税预计将对比亚迪股份有限公司、上汽集团和吉利汽车等公司造成损害，同时也可能影响到将中国工厂生产的汽车运往欧洲的西方制造商，例如特斯拉公司和宝马公司。【原文：Help is on the way for European carmakers struggling to deal with an influx of cheap Chinese electric vehicles. The European Commission is preparing to impose tariffs on EVs imported from China after an investigation into subsidies that Beijing doles out to its car industry. The duties are expected to hurt companies including BYD Co., SAIC Motor Corp. and Geely, but also risk affecting Western manufacturers that ship cars made at their Chinese factories to Europe — for example Tesla Inc. and BMW】

item.title: 印度家庭认为通胀将在未来数月加速
item.description: 印度中央银行的一项调查显示，印度家庭预计未来三个月至一年的通胀将加速，主要是受食品和住房的影响。【原文：Indian households expect inflation to accelerate through the next three months to one year driven mainly by food and housing, according to a survey by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: BTG 即将宣布收购纽约银行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，拉丁美洲最大的独立投资银行 BTG Pactual SA 即将宣布收购纽约的一家财富管理银行，作为全球扩张的一部分。【原文：Banco BTG Pactual SA, the biggest independent investment bank in Latin America, is close to announcing the acquisition of a wealth-management bank in New York as part of a global expansion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 未能遏制哥伦比亚赤字是银行首席执行官的 "主要担忧
item.description: 哥伦比亚最大银行的负责人警告说，如果不能控制财政赤字，就有可能赶走债券投资者，导致国家主权信用评级进一步恶化。【原文：The head of Colombia’s largest bank warned that failure to rein in the fiscal deficit risks driving away bond investors and causing a further deterioration of the nation’s sovereign credit rating.】

item.title: 世界排名倒数第一后，开普敦要求港口改进工作
item.description: 开普敦港在全球排名倒数第一后，其周边城市敦促开普敦港做得更好，尽管南非国营物流公司已采取措施提高业绩。【原文：The Port of Cape Town was urged to do better by the city that surrounds it after ranking last globally, even as South Africa’s state-run logistics firm took steps to improve performance.】

item.title: 私募股权投资巨头在奢华行业派对上神经紧绷
item.description: 在挂满吊灯的多功能厅外，在远离摄像机和主会场闷热展台的地方，私募股权投资界的巨头们正坦诚相见。【原文：Outside the chandelier-laden function rooms, away from the cameras and far from the stuffy booths in the main conference halls, the giants of private equity were getting honest with each other.】

item.description: 由于美国劳动力市场意外强劲，国债收益率飙升，使人们对美联储今年降息的预期减弱。【原文：Treasury yields surged given surprise strength in the US labor market, dimming wagers on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 道明银行起诉在洗钱审查期间离职的财富顾问
item.description: 这似乎是一起典型的公司与前雇员之间的纠纷：多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）上个月起诉财富顾问格雷格-德斯马莱斯（Gregg Desmarais），称他和一位同事 "突然 "辞职，并违反合同，将拥有数百万美元资产的客户引诱到竞争对手雷蒙德-詹姆斯金融公司（Raymond James Financial Inc.【原文：It seemed like a typical dispute between a company and a former employee: Toronto-Dominion Bank sued wealth adviser Gregg Desmarais last month, claiming he and a colleague “abruptly” resigned and violated their contracts by luring away clients with millions of dollars of assets to competitor Raymond James Financial Inc.】

item.title: NextEra 和 Entergy 将建设 4.5 千兆瓦太阳能和电池项目
item.description: Entergy Corp. 和 NextEra Energy Inc. 的一个部门宣布了一项开发多达 4.5 千兆瓦太阳能和储能项目的协议，这是对可再生能源的押注，以满足历史性增长的电力需求。【原文：Entergy Corp. and a unit of NextEra Energy Inc. announced an agreement to develop as much as 4.5 gigawatts of solar and energy storage projects, a bet on renewables to meet a historic rise in electricity demand.】
